problem.question: To remove a stripped screw from wood, you should:
options: Place a rubber band over the screw head and use the screwdriver through the rubber band for extra grip.
Place a paper towel over the screw head and use the screwdriver through the paper towel for extra grip.

key_steps: Stripped screw has damaged grooves, reducing grip
Rubber band fills gaps and increases friction
Rubber is elastic and conforms to irregular surface
Paper towel is thin and tears easily under torque

constraints.description: Material must be strong and have high friction

logic_requirements: Explains why rubber provides better grip than paper
